trans-unit.source: The XpsFont class has no public constructor.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> method to add a font and obtain a reference to it in a new document.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetFont%2A> method to obtain a font reference in an existing document.

Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> method of the XpsFont class may be delayed until the whole <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
Gets a value that indicates whether the font is obfuscated.

For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the font is obfuscated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether text that uses this font can be modified.

For more information about the use of restricted fonts, see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if text that uses this font can be changed or edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The ObfuscateFontData method is provided for use when you are legally obligated to obfuscate licensed proprietary fonts.

While this method does not provide encryption, the ObfuscateFontData method can be used to inhibit users from unzipping proprietary [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts and installing them separately for other uses.

For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to use to obfuscate the `fontdata`.
